name: PHOTOPSIA.
description:
The more photos you take, the more lonely you get.

This is the 2 minute and 30 seconds experience of being a photographer in an alien place.

Xbox Controller:

  • Left stick // move
  • Right stick // look around
  • Right bumper // SNAP!

Keyboard (not recommended):

  • wasd // move
  • arrow keys // look around
  • space // SNAP!

Credits:

Simon Stålhandske

Tools used:

  • Unity 2017.1.2
  • Ableton Live 9
  • DoTween
  • York Whiteletter Font (https://www.dafont.com/yorkwhiteletter.font)
  • PixelSpriteGenerator-Unity (https://github.com/Shogan/PixelSpriteGenerator-Unity)
  • Texture Scaler (http://wiki.unity3d.com/index.php/TextureScale)
